definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to describe sth as/an analogy/a simile/a metaphor/an allegory

sentences.english: In chapter five, the relation between metonymy and syntax is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 第五章讨论了转喻同句法的关系。

sentences.english: Thought that the violence an extension explains, completes to one kind of intrinsic real writing.
sentences.chinese: 想暴力的一个转喻，以完成对一种内在真实的书写。

sentences.english: Metonymy expresses in a disguised form among other spiritual field and culture phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 转喻在其他精神领域和文化现象中也有变相的表现。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, metonymy in English news adapts to the social world.
sentences.chinese: 转喻的使用也顺应了社交世界。

sentences.english: Metaphorical and metonymic sense extensions have their respective features.
sentences.chinese: 隐喻和转喻意义扩展各有其特点。

sentences.english: The Idealized Cognitive Model (ICM) which contains stands-for relations is what we referred as metonymic models.
sentences.chinese: 包含有替代关系的理想认知模型即被称为转喻模型。

sentences.english: Secondly, the formation mechanism for English euphemism is metonymy rather than metaphor.
sentences.chinese: 第二，委婉语的构成机制是转喻而非隐喻。

sentences.english: The interpretation of nominal tautology requires metonymic reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 同语的理解需要运用转喻推理。

sentences.english: Metonymy is a common phenomenon in Chinese texts.
sentences.chinese: 转喻是汉语文本中常见的语言现象。

sentences.english: Metonymy has its own logic, which shows the main characteristics as follows.
sentences.chinese: 转喻有自身的逻辑特征。

sentences.english: Morphemes metaphor or metonymy used to form the meaning of a word is called recessive relationship.
sentences.chinese: 语素义通过比喻或转喻来构成词义的叫作隐性关系。

sentences.english: Metonymy is a basic mode of thinking used in everyday communication.
sentences.chinese: 转喻是被广泛用于日常交际中的一种基本思维方式。

sentences.english: The overlapping or interaction of metaphor and metonymy sometimes exists in semantic extension.
sentences.chinese: 隐喻和转喻在词义延伸中有时会交叉或相互作用。

sentences.english: Body words are changed into measure words by means of metaphor.
sentences.chinese: 人体词的量词化是在隐喻或转喻的机制下完成的。

sentences.english: Metaphor and metonymy is one of the important topics of cognitive linguistics in modern western research.
sentences.chinese: 隐喻和转喻是当代西方认知语言学研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: Metaphor focuses on the property of similarity between two domains, while metonymy focuses on that of contiguity.
sentences.chinese: 但是，隐喻注重相似性，转喻以相邻关系为特征。

definition: to use sth as a metaphor
language component/morpheme/individual characters (making up an expression)
